com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp
Interface OGPCPConverter

public interface OGPCPConverter

Interface description:
OGPCPConverter is interface for all Construction Protocol converters from external dynamic geometry systems toward OpenGeoProver.

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic

Field Summary
static java.lang.String VERSION_NUM
           Version number of interface in form xx.yy where xx is major version/release number and yy is minor release number.
 
Method Summary
 OGPCP convertCP(java.lang.Object inputCP)
          Method that accepts input CP and converts it to internal construction protocol (in OGP format).
 

Field Detail

VERSION_NUM

static final java.lang.String VERSION_NUM
Version number of interface in form xx.yy where xx is major version/release number and yy is minor release number.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

convertCP

OGPCP convertCP(java.lang.Object inputCP)
Method that accepts input CP and converts it to internal construction protocol (in OGP format).

Parameters:
inputCP - CP from external system
Returns:
OGP CP which is result of conversion of input CP
